description.value: Your deep wisdom and insight allow you to predict dangers in advance. Each day during your daily preparations, choose yourself or one ally. The first time each day that the chosen creature rolls initiative or defends against a hostile creature or other danger, you automatically cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq] on them as a divine innate spell, without spending any actions to do so. This foresight occurs instantly, granting the target the circumstance bonus to the initiative roll or allowing you to use your reaction for foresight's Foresight reaction against the hostile creature or other danger if you have a reaction available.
